helpful: 2 of 2 people (100%) found this review helpful
review: No hud, no ammo indicator, no crosshair and no other ♥♥♥♥♥♥♥t. It's just you, your gun and your brains. This game also has really cool game modes that I find very enjoyable. This is one of the best fps games I've played in quite some time. A must buy!
